definitions.definition: To estimate too low; to perceive (someone or something) as having a lower value , quantity , worth , etc., than what he/she/it actually has.
To perceive or expect (someone or something) to be less significant or difficult than it actually is.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To estimate too low; to perceive (someone or something) as having a lower value , quantity , worth , etc., than what he/she/it actually has.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To perceive or expect (someone or something) to be less significant or difficult than it actually is.
